'''''Smith of Wootton Major & Farmer Giles of Ham''''' is an anthology, first published in [[1969]] by [[Ballantine Books]], collecting the books ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]'' and ''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]'' under the same covers.
